#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,count=0;
    while(1)
    {
        count++;
        cin>>n;
        if(n==0)break;
        else
        {
            int sum=0,res=0;
            int a[n+1];
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                cin>>a[i];
                sum+=a[i];
            }
            int req=sum/n;
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                if(a[i]>req)res+=(a[i]-req);
            }
            cout<<"Set #"<<count<<endl<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<res<<"."<<endl;
        }
    }
}
